title: Banor Development
subtitle: Property Rehabilitation & Neighborhood Stabilization
description: For-profit arm acquiring vacant properties, rehabilitating infrastructure, and stabilizing neighborhoods with community-first redevelopment.
intro: Banor Development acquires and rehabilitates vacant and distressed properties. We employ Foundation graduates, restore infrastructure, and stabilize neighborhoods—one block at a time.

items.title: Acquisition Strategy
items.description: Targeted acquisition of vacant, tax-delinquent, and distressed properties. Municipal partnerships and land bank agreements.

items.title: Rehabilitation Standards
items.description: Full gut rehabs with modern systems. Energy-efficient upgrades. Durable, quality finishes.

items.title: Infrastructure Stabilization
items.description: Street improvements, utility upgrades, and green infrastructure. We invest beyond the lot line.

items.title: Community-First
items.description: Local hiring. Community input. Affordable housing set-asides. Neighborhood ownership.

steps.title: Identify & Acquire
steps.description: Target properties aligned with neighborhood plans. Negotiate with owners, land banks, municipalities.

steps.title: Design & Permits
steps.description: Architectural plans, engineering, permits. Foundation trainees support pre-construction.

steps.title: Rehabilitate
steps.description: Full construction with local labor. Foundation graduates as primary workforce.

steps.title: Stabilize & Exit
steps.description: Lease or sell. Reinvest proceeds. Scale to next project.

sections.title: See Our Work
sections.content: Explore completed and in-progress projects across our portfolio.
